page.title: 20THE FUTURE. (and CREDITS)
page.content:
THE FUTURE. Although the{Domesday {Survey of 1985/1986}is very much a recording of{life today}and will no doubt be{regarded}by{future historians as the{definitive primary source of {information}for the{period}it{also {represents}the{begining}of a{new age of{technology}starting with the {micro-computer}and{inter-active video.
CREDITS. The{staff}and{pupils}of{St. {Nicholas' School}are{proud}to have {made}a{contribution}to the{Domesday {Survey}as are the{townspeople}of {Kenilworth.}We{hope}that any{future {user}of the{Optical, Laser-vision {Disks}containing the{Kenilworth {information}will find their efforts {rewarding}and the{picture}we have painted of our{town}both{interesting and{informative. Martin L.Jackson - Headmaster.
